title: Any occupant of a slum structure included in URC, either residential or commercial, whether eligible under Slum Rehabilitation Scheme or not but eligible under this Regulation, shall be entitled for a carpet area as prescribed in Slum Rehabilitation Scheme
clause_text: Any occupant of a slum structure included in URC, either residential or commercial, whether eligible under Slum Rehabilitation Scheme or not but eligible under this Regulation, shall be entitled for a carpet area as prescribed in Slum Rehabilitation Scheme.
